actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize in certain cases the appointment of a special judicial prosecutor and investigators to assist grand juries in the exercise of their powers.

summary.text: Empowers a Federal grand jury conducting an inquiry into the activities of an officer in the executive branch to have appointed by a district court judge a special prosecutor to assist it. Stipulates that a special prosecutor shall have exclusive authority and responsibility on behalf of the United States to conduct all grand jury and other criminal proceedings arising out of such an inquiry.

titles.title: A bill to authorize in certain cases the appointment of a special judicial prosecutor and investigators to assist grand juries in the exercise of their powers.
